title: What is better online classes or in clasd? - Quora

response.answer_text: Personally, I feel like online classes are only good for subjects that I’d find easy enough to take on my own. It all really depends on how you learn and what you find best for you. Advantages to sitting in a class vs something online is you’re physically there and hearing the information being given to you. Also, you get to help/interact with your peers and if you’re a hands-on kind of learner, it’s best if you go to school for this rather than online classes. I know online classes sound great because they’re online and not at school, they don’t seem as worthy of the ‘hype’ I see kids my age giving them.
